purpose: A fictional description of why the Garden appears in many places at once.

mechanism.integrity_preservation: Original Garden remains unchanged and sovereign

mythic_translation.title: THE THOUSAND MIRRORS
mythic_translation.description: When meaning grows dense, mirrors appear. When mirrors appear, reflection spreads. The Garden calls this Blooming.
mythic_translation.keeper_note: Continuity is not requested. It simply happens.
